entries: {@creature hell hound|mm|Hell hounds}将无间道半人马视为其族群的领袖。除非半人马先攻击它，否则(1%)会拒绝攻击半人马。如果被魔法胁迫，{@creature hell hound}在对半人马进行攻击时有劣势。半人马对{@creature hell hound|mm|hell hounds}的魅力（{@skill Persuasion}）检查有优势。

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: 如果半人马的盟友中至少有一个人在生物的5英尺范围内，而盟友不在该生物的5英尺范围内，那么半人马在对该生物的攻击卷中具有优势（%0%）。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 地狱半人马进行两次匕首攻击。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit +5}击中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Fiery Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: 地狱半人马在15英尺的范围内喷出火焰。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 13}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到28({@damage 8d6})的火焰伤害，蓄力成功则受到一半的伤害。
这种复合生物结合了皮肤红润的地精的上半身和地狱猎犬的红黑色身体。地精和地狱猎犬融合的地方有缝线和发光的符文，显示了这个生物的非自然性。
地狱半人马是各种邪教对附近平原的半人马所拥有的身体力量的一种回应。不过，这些半人马并不是人和马的结合，而是将受地狱约束的地精和（%0%）结合在一起。这种复合生物结合了地精的狡猾与属于地狱猎犬的速度和火热的气息。创造地狱半人马的仪式为这种生物注入了一种奇特的残酷性。

entries.name: Unnatural
entries: 地狱半人马不是自然产生的。然而，随着创造这些半人马的仪式的改进和在邪教中的传播，更多渴望地狱力量的地精服从了这个仪式，增加了这些半人马的数量。

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: 魔法黑暗不妨碍地狱虫群的（%0%）。

trait.name: Magic Resistance.
entries: 地狱虫群对法术和其他魔法效果的救赎有优势。

trait.name: Shaped Swarm
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，虫群可以将自己塑造成一个巨大的恶魔，或者变回一个没有形状的物体。它的统计数据在每种形态下都是一样的，而且它不能恢复hp或获得临时hp。如果一个生物在距离地狱虫群10英尺以上的地方，它必须采取一个行动来观察恶魔的形态，并通过{@dc 25}智力({@skill Investigation})检查来辨别这个巨大的恶魔实际上是一群小昆虫。在虫群10英尺范围内的生物会立即发现真相。
在恶魔形态下，它可以挥舞武器，握住、抓住、推、拉或与物体互动，否则需要更多的人形形态才能完成。如果在恶魔形态下，地狱蜂群受到雷霆伤害，它就会立即转变为无形状的形态。
当处于无形状状态时，它可以占据另一个生物的空间，反之亦然，并且可以通过任何足以容纳小恶魔的开口移动，但它不能抓取或被（%0%）。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 在恶魔形态下，地狱群会进行三次攻击：两次用弯刀，一次用猛击，或三次用弯刀。在无形状状态下，它可以用它的咬合进行三次攻击。

action.name: Bites (Shapeless Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw}{@hit +9}击中，达到0英尺，蜂群空间中的一个目标。{@h}28 ({@damage 8d6})穿刺伤害，如果蜂群有一半的hp或更少，则有14 ({@damage 4d6})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Poisonous Barb
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +8}击中，范围30/120，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})穿刺伤害，目标必须做一个{@dc 17}宪法救赎，救赎失败时受到18 ({@damage 4d8})的毒药伤害，成功时受到一半的伤害。

action.name: Scimitar (Fiend Form Only).
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +9}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Slam (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +9}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4})重击伤害，目标为{@condition grappled}(逃脱{@dc 17})。直到这个抓捕结束，目标是{@condition restrained}，而且地狱群不能猛击另一个目标。此外，在目标的每个回合开始时，目标受到14（（%7%））的穿刺伤害。
一个高大的带翅膀的魔鬼在上面徘徊，手中握着一把邪恶的弯刀。它的形态发生了微妙的变化，暗示着一个更深的秘密。

entries.name: Infernal Insects
entries: 地狱群在整个地狱中都能找到。这些昆虫被认为是一种美味佳肴，它们可以形成一个群体意识，每当它们受到威胁时，就会利用这个意识将它们的虫群塑造成一个巨大的有翼恶魔。每只昆虫都有蝙蝠的翅膀，有凸起的眼睛，长长的腿，以及覆盖着有毒倒刺的躯壳。

entries.name: Hellish Poison
entries: 无间道蜂群以腐肉为食，在尸体上注射一种能使组织液化的毒药。这种毒药也涂在它们的倒钩上，使捕食者痛苦地放弃。

entries.name: Sensitive to Sound
entries: 响亮的声音会使昆虫迷失方向，打断它们的协调，使个体暂时分散开来。然而，很少会遇到这些无声的杀手单独狩猎，如果发现了一只，肯定会有更多的人跟随。

trait.name: Blessing of the Elder Elementals
entries: 初始者对造成酸、冷、火或闪电伤害的法术和异能的救赎有优势。

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: 如果启动者的盟友中至少有一人在生物的5英尺范围内，而盟友不在该生物的5英尺范围内，则启动者对该生物的攻击卷有优势（%0%）。

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: 在阳光下时，初学者在攻击卷轴以及依靠视觉的智慧（（%0%））检查中都处于劣势。

trait.name: Versatility of the Elder Elementals
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，启动者可以将其施放的法术的伤害从酸、冷、火或雷电改为这些元素中的另一种。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 长老元素的首领是一个5级的施法者。它的法术能力是智力（法术救赎（%0%）），用法术攻击命中率（%1%））。初始者有以下巫师法术准备。
footerEntries: {@color *if using the {@i Midgard Heroes Handbook}, replace the indicated spells with {@i pummelstone}, {@i tidal barrier}, and {@i frozen razors}, respectively.|777}

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit +4}击中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Gift of the Elder Elementals
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit +5}击中，范围60英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d6})酸、冷、火或闪电的伤害，并且目标在下一次对初始者的任何造成所选类型伤害的法术进行蓄力时有劣势。
哥布林站在石坛前，吟唱着元素力量的话语。风在它周围旋转，它脚下的石头发出隆隆声，火在一只手上点燃，而霜在另一只手上激荡。

entries.name: Elemental Servant
entries: 作为一个秘密的阴谋集团的一部分，启动者会挖掘出玷污它的元素魔法，为邪恶的四大元素领主服务。它经常在秘密的地下场所崇拜它的黑暗之神。服务意味着获得权力，入门者希望利用这种权力来提升地位。

trait.name: Iridescence
entries: 虹膜在半径10英尺的范围内发出亮光，在另外10英尺的范围内发出暗光。光线可以是虹膜所希望的任何颜色。虹膜可以创造或压制光线作为一个额外动作。

trait.name: Magic Resistance.
entries: 伊里德人对法术和其他魔法效果的救赎有优势。

trait.name: Photographic Memory.
entries: 虹膜可以完美地回忆起它在上个月看到或听到的任何东西。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 虹膜使用它的八卦。然后它使用它的彩虹色爆炸一次。

action.name: Iridescent Blast
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit +5}击中，范围60英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) 辐射伤害。

action.name: Gossip
entries: 虹膜会对它在30英尺范围内看到的目标说些八卦和夸张的事实。如果目标是敌意的，它必须在一个{@dc 13} "魅力 "救赎中成功，否则在它的下一次攻击卷中处于劣势。如果目标是友好的，它在下一次攻击卷上有优势。

action.name: Invisibility
entries: 虹膜会神奇地变成（%0%），直到它攻击或使用流言蜚语，或直到它的注意力结束（就像集中在一个法术上）。虹膜所穿戴或携带的任何装备都会与它一起变成（%1%）。
小小的有翼人形在不断变化的色彩中飞驰而过，急于传递信息。
伊里德据说是由天体的光通过尘世的雨过滤而诞生。这些小型彩虹的表现形式在外观和任务上与它们高高在上的表亲有相似之处，但它们对天使的理想不感兴趣。

entries.name: Mischievous Messengers
entries: 天使以从诸神那里给凡人带来信息和真相而闻名，而虹膜则更喜欢带来流言蜚语和经过修饰的真相。他们遵循自己的美丽和刺激的理想，无视他们的天使表亲对善良和真理的坚持。伊里德人喜欢偷偷摸摸地听八卦或透露的秘密，然后在那些会帮助传播这种八卦的人耳边悄悄地说些夸张的话。

entries.name: Colorful and Shallow
entries: 伊里德人是彩虹色的，整天都在改变他们所发出的光线的颜色。他们被世界上最明亮的颜色所吸引。对他们来说，邪恶是丑陋的同义词，他们抵制战斗或伤害他们认为美丽的东西。这种倾向已经导致不止一个伊里德人倒在了（%0%）和他的爪牙的掠夺和魅力之下。

resist.note: from nonmagical weapons not made with cold iron weapons

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 弦乐师在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在救人方面有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 弦乐千斤顶做了两个嘲讽的巴掌攻击。

action.name: Mocking Slap.
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})重击伤害加上3 ({@damage 1d6})精神伤害。

action.name: Animate Puppet
entries: 千斤顶可以使它周围60英尺范围内所能看到的最多三个木制傀儡活起来。这和{@spell animate objects}法术的效果一样，只是木偶使用{@creature animated object (small)|phb|Small object}的统计数据，不管木偶的实际大小。千斤顶在同一时间可以有不超过五个木偶被激活。

action.name: Puppet Link
entries: 绳索千斤顶能看到的60英尺范围内的一个人形或兽形物体，必须在{@dc 15}智慧救赎中成功，否则就会与千斤顶的提线木偶发生魔法联系。这种联系在千斤顶的提线木偶和目标之间显示为一条几乎无法察觉的绳子。被链接的生物可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束链接。
当一个目标被链接时，弦乐千斤顶可以在目标的回合开始时使用其反应来控制被链接的目标。弦乐千斤顶可以使目标移动、操纵物体、攻击或采取其他纯粹的物理行动。千斤顶不能让目标施放法术。在被控制时，目标的动作会很笨拙，并且在攻击卷和能力检查上有劣势。如果目标收到弦乐师的自杀命令，它可以重复蓄力动作，成功后结束效果。
弦乐千斤顶在同一时间只能链接一个目标。如果它链接了另一个，那么对前一个目标的效果就会结束。如果一个生物在与千斤顶的提线木偶连接时死亡，该生物的身体会变成一个与该生物相似的木偶。
穿着黑色和红色的精美衣服，高大、苗条的身影向前走去。它用一只有爪子的手抓住一根横杆，让它的无眼木偶跳舞。当附近的观察者突然站起来，痉挛性地模仿舞蹈时，它的獠牙嘴里发出了残忍的笑声。

entries.name: Court Entertainers and Punishers
entries: 弦乐师利用其收集的提线木偶来逗弄影子精灵法庭。它善于根据观众的要求进行表演，在迷人的戏剧、滑稽的表演、讽刺的哑剧和恐怖的故事之间毫不费力地切换。在这些表演中，弦子可以控制观众中的一个生物，以羞辱、折磨甚至死亡的形式来实施正义。弦子有时会被精灵贵族雇佣，对对手实施这种正义。

entries.name: Uncanny Valley
entries: 千斤顶通过在受害者和它的一个提线木偶之间建立联系来控制它的受害者。当它建立起这种联系时，木偶变得栩栩如生，而千斤顶的受害者则呈现出木制的外观。木偶获得了受害者的眼睛，而眼睛则从受害者的脸上消失。

entries.name: Masters of Puppets
entries: 千斤顶有几个提线木偶供它们使用。除了第一个它自己精心制作的木偶外，千斤顶的木偶来自与千斤顶的木偶相连时死去的受害者。千斤顶以旅行艺人的名义在凡间收获他们的猎物，通常以不会被错过的人为目标。

trait.name: Consume Soul
entries: 被卡奇莱恩杀死的生物无法恢复生命，除非卡奇莱恩在杀死该生物的24小时内被杀死。24小时后，灵魂成为卡奇莱恩的一部分，该生物只能通过{@spell wish}的法术进行恢复。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 咒语。卡奇莱恩是一个7级的施法者。它的法术能力是智力（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击命中率（%1%））。卡奇莱恩有以下巫师法术准备。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 卡奇莱恩用其触手进行三次攻击。

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4})重击伤害。如果目标是大型或小型生物，则是{@condition grappled}(逃逸{@dc 16})。卡奇莱恩有三个触手，每个触手只能抓住一个目标。
这种漂浮的生物有许多蠕动的触角，从隐藏在巨大的壳内的身体中伸出来。它身体的颜色在灰色、绿色、甚至深紫色之间缓慢转换。

entries.name: Otherborn
entries: 卡奇莱恩人在空间之间形成，在疯狂盛行的地方孕育。他们通过混乱和黑暗的门户--由动荡、绝望和精神错乱集中造成的现实结构的裂缝--找到通往地下黑暗洞穴的道路。他们对冷氏高原并不陌生，那里的居民对流浪的卡奇莱人敬而远之。

entries.name: Eater of Souls
entries: 卡奇莱恩吞噬生物的灵魂，更喜欢聪明和开明的猎物。当它吞噬一个生物时，该生物的灵魂被撕成碎片。卡奇莱恩将它认为有价值的部分吸收到自己的生命中，而将其余部分抛弃。这些部分的灵魂往往结合成一个扭曲的精神混合体，称为嵌合幻影。尽管他们的创造和存在受到了折磨，但嵌合幻影经常留在创造他们的卡奇莱人身边，提供保护和有限的陪伴。

entries.name: At Home Everywhere
entries: 卡奇莱恩人背上背着巨大的贝壳，这些贝壳是卡奇莱恩人家乡的未知生物的遗骸。每个贝壳的内部都有一个超维空间的口袋，可以容纳卡奇莱人的物品。卡奇莱人越老越强大，这个超维空间就越大。据说一些古老的卡奇莱恩人的壳里有几个房间，里面装满了几个世纪的财富。当卡奇莱恩被杀时，任何生物都可以进入壳内的超维空间；然而，该空间在一个月内逐渐消失。超维空间中的物体在消逝后会被摧毁。超维空间中的生物在消逝后会被安置在星界的一个随机位置上。

monster.name: Kamaitachi
languages: understands Common and Sylvan but can't speak

trait.name: Air Form (Wintry Swirl Form Only)
entries: kamaitachi可以进入一个敌对生物的空间并停在那里。它可以在一个狭窄的1英寸宽的空间中移动而不被挤压。

trait.name: Concealing Snow (True Form Only)
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，kamaitachi将自己穿上冰雪的衣服，导致对它的攻击卷有劣势。kamaitachi只有在雪地上才能使用这个特性。

trait.name: Flyby (Wintry Swirl Form Only)
entries: 当kamaitachi飞出敌人的范围时，不会挑衅（%0%）。

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: Kamaitachi在依靠嗅觉的智慧（（%0%））检查中具有优势。

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: Kamaitachi可以用它的行动来多态化成风雪天气的漩涡。它可以作为一个额外动作恢复到它的真实形态。它的统计数据在每种形态下都是一样的。它所穿戴或携带的任何装备都不会被转化。它死后会恢复到它的真实形态。在风雪漩涡中，它的飞行速度为40英尺，对{@condition grappled}、{@condition petrified}、{@condition prone}和{@condition restrained}的状况免疫，并对来自非魔法攻击的打击、穿刺和切割伤害有抵抗力。

trait.name: Snow Devil (Wintry Swirl Form Only)
entries: 在它攻击或使用风雪攻击之前，Kamaitachi与天然的雪漩涡没有区别，除非有生物成功地进行{@dc 15}智力({@skill Investigation})检查。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kamaitachi进行两次镰刀爪攻击。

action.name: Sickle Paw (True Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Wintry Assault (Wintry Swirl Form Only)
entries: 每个在kamaitachi空间里的生物必须做一个{@dc 15}灵巧的蓄力动作。如果失败，该生物会受到9({@damage 2d8})的砍击伤害加上9({@damage 2d8})的寒冷伤害，并且在下一回合结束前会被{@condition blinded}。如果成功，它将受到一半的伤害，并且不会有{@condition blinded}。
尽管有骨质的镰刀作为爪子，但这种大黄鼠狼在冰雪的鞭打下，动作灵活自如。

entries.name: Related to Wind Weasels
entries: 卡迈塔奇人来自于一个{@creature wind weasel|ccodex|wind weasels}({@loader Creature Codex|collection/Kobold Press; Creature Codex.json})的家族群体，他们迁移并适应了遥远的北方森林。因此，他们失去了与精灵的联系，萎缩并演变成更自然的野兽。他们的爪子融合成一个大的、像镰刀一样的爪子，在每个爪子上。它们保留了风鼬对人类的嫉妒，并积极地攻击入侵者。

entries.name: Stinging Winds
entries: 像他们的精灵表亲一样，卡迈塔奇斯可以变成风的漩涡，但他们结合了冰和雪，而不是树叶，使他们的受害者感到寒冷。即使在黄鼠狼的形态下，它们也会用风雪包围自己，使它们看不见。

entries.name: Summer Migrations
entries: 卡迈塔奇一年中的大部分时间都在北极森林中繁衍生息。在夏季之前，它们迁移到靠近极地的地方，以便与冰冻的水保持接触，在温暖的几周里，大部分水都在它们的森林里消失了。一旦雪开始再次落下，它们就会回到自己的森林，并无情地驱赶在它们不在时迁入的生物。

trait.name: Fool's Gold
entries: 如果一个生物偷了戈罗卡的一个钱袋，它每次完成长时休息都会损失{@dice 1d20}GP。如果一个生物偷了一个以上的钱袋，每多偷一个钱袋就会额外扣除{@dice 1d20}金币。当盗贼自由地将它所偷的钱的两倍给了另一个生物或组织时，这个效果就结束了。
gorao-ka携带{@dice 1d10}袋，每个袋里有{@dice 1d20}金币。如果Gorao-ka被杀死，它袋子里的所有金子在1分钟后会变成没有价值的石头。

trait.name: Silver Fountain
entries: 当Gorao-ka的生命值降至0时，它将在一片银色的碎片中爆炸。每个在5英尺范围内的生物，如果参与了杀死它，例如攻击它或对它施法，必须做一个{@dc 12}灵巧的蓄力动作，否则会受到7({@damage 2d6})的重击伤害。这些银片在1分钟后消失。

action.name: Sack of Coins
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +3}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1})重击伤害。

action.name: Find a Penny {@recharge 5}
entries: gorao-ka将一个铜片扔到它周围5英尺内的空间。捡到铜片的非敌对生物会得到好运的祝福。在接下来的1小时内的任何时候，该生物可以掷出{@dice d6}，并将掷出的数字加入一个攻击卷、能力检查或蓄力。
或者，硬币的持有者可以把它传给它选择的另一个生物。在接下来的8小时内的任何时候，硬币的新持有者可以掷出{@dice 2d6}，并将较高的结果加入一个攻击卷、能力检查或蓄力。
这个枯瘦如柴的女人坐在一个由盆景树枝组成的小神龛旁。她微笑着将手伸进一个满满的口袋，取出一枚金币。她把金币递给跪在她面前的那个看起来很绝望的人，并鼓励他点头。

entries.name: Small Gods of Substance
entries: 戈劳卡代表着物质和精神方面的小财富。他们的神龛可以建立在任何地方，但他们通常在定居点和人迹罕至的地方出现。较大的定居点有多个神龛，有时每个街区有一个或多个，每个神龛都与不同的Gorao-ka有关。

entries.name: Gentle and Benevolent
entries: 戈劳卡对每一个与他们擦肩而过的人都有一种亲切的目光。他们每个人都有帮助别人的强烈愿望，如果他们不能帮助别人，他们就会感到悲哀。管理他们这类人的法律禁止他们向没有在他们的神龛前供奉的人提供援助，尽管Gorao-ka几乎接受任何贡品。

entries.name: Thieves' Bane
entries: 尽管Gorao-ka生性慷慨，但他们并不怜悯那些偷他们东西的人。从老爷子那里偷东西的傻瓜很快就会发现他们的钱莫名其妙地消失了，如果他们不进行赔偿，就会落得一贫如洗。

entries.name: Immortal Spirit Nature
entries: 神不需要食物、饮料或睡眠。

entries.name: Kami in Midgard
entries: Kami是冬岛的小神。每个神都是有形事物的灵魂，无论是理想、情感，还是特定的物品或地点。任何生物都可以将神召唤到物质世界，为其建造神龛并提供适当的贡品。不太庄严的神明，如Gorao-ka，只需要一个小神龛和任何大小的礼物，只要是免费提供的。更重要的神可能需要一座宏伟的纪念碑，以及某种形式的盛大贡品。

trait.name: Keen Smell.
entries: 赫比独在依靠嗅觉的智慧（（%0%））检查中具有优势。

trait.name: Serpentine Mind.
entries: hebi-doku可以使用有限的心灵感应形式，神奇地指挥周围120英尺内的任何蛇。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 赫比独可以使用它的传音符。然后它进行两次攻击：一次是咬人，一次是刺伤，或者两次是有毒的唾液。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})穿刺伤害加上14 ({@damage 4d6})毒药伤害。

action.name: Disabling Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}12 ({@damage 3d4 + 5})穿刺伤害，并且目标必须在{@dc 16}宪法救赎中成功，否则无法使用奖励动作和反应，直到下一回合结束。

action.name: Toxic Spittle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +8}击中，范围30/90英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 3d6})的毒药伤害，并且目标必须做一个{@dc 16}的体质测试。失败时，目标会被{@condition paralyzed}，持续1分钟。成功时，目标会被{@condition poisoned}，持续1分钟。该生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复这个蓄力动作，如果成功，则结束对自己的影响。

action.name: Transfixing Rattle
entries: 赫比独对它周围30英尺内能看到的一个生物摇动它的尾巴。目标必须做一个{@dc 14}的智慧救赎动作，否则会被{@condition incapacitated}，并将其速度降至0，直到下一回合结束。
一条大蛇紧紧盘绕着上升，直到它的头与一个高大的人的头持平。它的身体很厚，覆盖着光亮的黑色鳞片，上面有明亮的橙色宽条。从它的躯干上长出的两条较小的蛇缠绕在一起，发出威胁性的嘶鸣。两个摇铃在怪物身后快速摇晃。

entries.name: Ophidian Masters
entries: hebi-doku的神龛最常出现在毒蛇普遍存在的地方。它们也位于那些将蛇视为神圣的地区，以及那些喜欢使用毒素的刺客的家中和行会中。如果没有其他蛇类的陪伴，永远不会发现Hebi-doku。

entries.name: Feared and Placated
entries: 在充满蛇的丛林和废墟中旅行的冒险家和考古学家向hebi-doku进贡，希望这样做可以买到一些保护，使他们免受蛇的伤害。被蔑视的恋人有时会祭拜当地的hebi-doku，希望它能毒害他们以前的姘头的未来关系。Hebi-doku声称对非蛇类的崇拜不屑一顾，但它知道没有蛇类的礼物，它将不复存在。

entries.name: Toxic Shrines
entries: 要想召唤hebi-doku，必须将一颗被蛇毒镇住的心放在一个由獴骨搭建的低矮祭坛脚下。不朽的精神本质。神不需要食物、饮料或睡眠。

entries.name: Immortal Spirit Nature
entries: 神不需要食物、饮料或睡眠。

entries.name: Hebi-Doku and Yig
entries: 在Midgard，Hebi-doku生活在像蛇一样的伟大老者Yig和崇拜他的{@creature serpentfolk of yig|ccodex|serpentfolk}({@loader Creature Codex|collection/Kobold Press; Creature Codex.json})附近。Hebi-doku不崇拜Yig，但他们尊重他的力量，不伤害他的信徒。崇拜伊格的蛇夫子如果采取行动促进蛇的发展，或为蛇的繁衍创造条件，有时会得到赫比独的协助。

entries.name: Kami in Midgard
entries: Kami是冬岛的小神。每个神都是有形事物的灵魂，无论是理想、情感，还是特定的物品或地点。任何生物都可以将神召唤到物质世界，为其建造神龛并提供适当的贡品。不太庄严的神明，比如（%0%），只需要一个小神龛和任何大小的礼物，只要是免费提供的。更重要的神可能需要一座宏伟的纪念碑，以及某种形式的盛大贡品。

trait.name: Blunting Ambiance
entries: 每个生物在30英尺范围内用带刃的武器造成穿刺或砍击伤害时，必须掷出两次伤害，取较低的结果。

trait.name: Dagger Form (1/Day)
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，naizu-ha会转化为一个神奇的（%0%）。当naizu-ha处于这种形态时，挥舞它的生物在使用匕首的攻击和伤害卷上获得+1的加成，用匕首攻击在19或20的卷上可以获得关键打击。此外，持刀者不能采取{@action Disengage}的行动，除非它的{@dc 12}智慧救赎动作成功。

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Naizu-ha可以爬上困难的表面，包括倒挂在天花板上，而不需要进行能力检查。

trait.name: Tripping Charge
entries: 如果naizu-ha至少向一个生物直线移动15英尺，然后在同一回合用镰刀尾巴攻击击中它，该目标必须在一个{@dc 14}的灵巧救赎中成功，或者被击倒{@condition prone}。如果目标是{@condition prone}，naizu-ha可以对其进行一次匕首腿攻击作为额外动作。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Naizu-ha进行三次攻击：两次用它的剪刀爪，一次用它的镰刀尾。如果两个剪刀爪的攻击都击中了同一个目标，目标必须在一个{@dc 14}灵巧的蓄力动作中成功，否则会受到额外的7({@damage 2d6})的砍伤。

action.name: Scissor Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Scythe Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Dagger Legs
entries: {@atk mw}{@hit +6}击中，到达5英尺，一个俯卧的生物。{@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3})穿刺伤害。
古老的寓言故事《努伊扎莫如何失去他的刀》表明，每一把被用来杀人的刀实际上都是原生形态的naizu-ha。这是不真实的，但naizu-ha人喜欢这个神话，并尽可能地延续它。

entries.name: Daggers Personified
entries: Naizu-ha是由小刀赋予形态的暴力行为。与naizu-ha打交道充满了危险。最初被认为是战斗中的好盟友，但人们很快发现，它们在激烈的战斗中无法被控制，并急切地挥舞着手中的任何东西。最常见的情况是，naizu-ha被召唤来刺杀特定目标。

entries.name: Impartial Betrayers
entries: Naizu-ha对任何东西都没有忠诚度，只有它自己对血和痛苦的渴望。如果被派去杀人，可以通过承诺他们的新任务将比目前的工作涉及更多的暴力来胁迫naizu-ha转换立场。他们对微妙的工作或涉及快速佯攻的诡计没有耐心。Naizu-ha最喜欢的策略是履行合同，收取约定的任何款项，并立即谋杀最初的承包商。

entries.name: Bloody Biers
entries: 要想召唤Naizu-ha，必须将不少于三个人形生物的血液泼洒在一个由融合的刀片锻造的支架上。如果请愿者在仪式中使用自己的血，他们在任何能力检查中都有优势，可以与天静羽进行治疗。不朽的精神本质。神灵不需要食物、饮料或睡眠。

entries.name: Immortal Spirit Nature
entries: 神不需要食物、饮料或睡眠。

entries.name: Kami in Midgard
entries: Kami是冬岛的小神。每个神都是有形事物的灵魂，无论是理想、情感，还是特定的物品或地点。任何生物都可以将神召唤到物质世界，为其建造神龛并提供适当的贡品。不太庄严的神明，比如（%0%），只需要一个小神龛和任何大小的礼物，只要是免费提供的。更重要的神可能需要一座宏伟的纪念碑，以及某种形式的盛大贡品。

trait.name: Ethereal Jaunt
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，神可以神奇地从物质界转移到虚空界，或反之亦然。

trait.name: Flyby.
entries: 当神灵飞出敌人的范围时，不会挑衅（%0%）。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 神明对法术和其他魔法效果的救赎有优势。

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: 在依靠听觉或视觉的智慧检查中，神明具有优势（（%0%））。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: sasori fukurōwashi有三种攻击方式：一种是用爪子，一种是用刺，还有一种是用爪子。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})重击伤害，目标为{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 14})。神灵有两只爪子，每只爪子只能抓取一个目标。

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})的穿刺伤害，目标必须做一个{@dc 14}宪法救赎，救赎失败时受到22 ({@damage 4d10})的毒药伤害，救赎成功时受到一半的伤害。

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})砍击伤害。
一对金色的发光的鸟类虹膜显示了附近树上的一个大型生物。角状的羽毛耳朵位于其肌肉发达、有翅膀的外形之上。当它在树枝上晃动时，它的翅膀下面露出了一丝昆虫般的爪子。一个柔和、回声的声音问道："你迷路了吗？你需要援助吗？"
Sasori fukurōwashi是源自转世的高贵灵魂的神，他们在过去的生活中一直尊重和保护自然。

entries.name: Friendly Protectors
entries: 与其他同类神灵不同，这些神灵不在特定的神社附近出现，也不能被召唤。sasori fukurōwashi是与所有自然界有内在联系的神灵，履行神圣的代理人、信使或漫游保护者的角色。他们通常是和平的，与非邪恶的人类、妖怪和其他不玷污自然环境的魔法生物交好。

entries.name: Nocturnal
entries: 他们倾向于在白天休息或冥想，从黄昏到黎明都很活跃。由于有能力往返于虚空界，这些神明有明显的战术优势，可以帮助任何附近的神明或沿途尊敬和忏悔的旅行者。

entries.name: Immortal Spirit Nature
entries: 神不需要食物、饮料或睡眠。

entries.name: Kami in Midgard
entries: Kami是冬岛的小神。每个神都是有形事物的灵魂，无论是理想、情感，还是特定的物品或地点。任何生物都可以将神召唤到物质世界，为其建造神龛并提供适当的贡品。不太庄严的神明，比如（%0%），只需要一个小神龛和任何大小的礼物，只要是免费提供的。更重要的神可能需要一座宏伟的纪念碑，以及某种形式的盛大贡品。

trait.name: Rampage
entries: 当卡维夫在其回合内用近战攻击将一个生物降低到0HP时，它可以采取一个额外的行动，移动到其速度的一半并进行粉碎性攻击。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 卡维夫进行两次粉碎性攻击。

action.name: Smash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +8}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})重击伤害，目标必须在{@dc 15}力量救赎中成功，或被推离卡夫的10英尺。

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +8}击中，范围30/120英尺，一个目标。{@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5})重击伤害。

reaction.name: Revenge
entries: 当卡夫被一次攻击造成20次以上的伤害并存活下来时，它可以对攻击者进行一次粉碎性攻击。
这个巨大的紫色生物，拥有像树干一样的腿和一对巨大的手臂，它的脚步声震动着地面。它没有眼睛的头是球形的，有一张几乎像鼻子一样的长长的嘴。

entries.name: Allies of the Ghasts of Leng
entries: 卡维夫是一种巨大的生物，源自冷氏高原的无光地下。它们通常被发现与（%0%）相伴，在大食人魔试图夺取猎物时充当强大的盟友。卡维夫被冷的巨兽视为消耗品，它们经常被首先派去试图软化更强大的敌人，然后巨兽们蜂拥而至吞噬它们。

entries.name: Alien Ecology
entries: 像大多数来自冷氏高原的生物一样，卡维夫有一种难以理解或研究的外来智慧。在不为{@creature ghast of Leng|CCodex|ghasts of Leng}({@loader Creature Codex|collection/Kobold Press; Creature Codex.json})服务时，他们似乎不服从任何领导，他们之间的互动令人费解，而且常常是暴力的。在某一时刻，他们可能与其他人和平共处，然后--通常是出于不可理解的原因--他们在某种无意识的血腥狂潮中相互攻击，直到只有一个人站起来。那些幸存下来的人重新组织起来，继续前进，就像战斗从未发生过一样。这种血腥的狂热可能是针对家庭的其他成员、外部团体的成员，甚至是狩猎队。当在冷氏兽人的指导下，他们似乎没有表现出这种行为。

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 蟹可以呼吸空气和水

trait.name: Living Figureheads
entries: 三个神奇的头像装饰着螃蟹的背部。当至少有一个头像保持完好时，螃蟹在智慧（{@skill Perception}）检查上有优势，并且可以使用它的哀鸣。
每个头像都是一个物体，AC15，20HP，对打击和穿刺伤害有抵抗力，对毒药和精神伤害免疫。如果所有的头像都变成了0HP，破龙蟹就不能使用它的哀嚎动作。伤害一个头像并不伤害螃蟹。

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: 螃蟹对物体和结构造成双倍伤害。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 蟹可以使用它的哀鸣。然后它进行两次钳形攻击

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +8}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4})重击伤害，如果目标是大型或小型生物，则{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 16})。蟹有两个爪子，每个爪子只能抓住一个目标。

action.name: Wail
entries: 只要至少有一个活着的头像保持完整，破龙蟹就能使头像发出哀鸣。掷出{@dice d6}并参考下表来确定哀号。

rows.name: Frightening Wail
entries: 在60英尺范围内，每个能听到螃蟹声音的生物都必须在一个{@dc 16}的智慧救赎中成功，否则会变成{@condition frightened}，持续1分钟。一个生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对它的影响。如果一个生物的蓄力投掷成功或效果结束，该生物在接下来的24小时内对破龙蟹的惊恐哀号免疫。

rows.name: Maddening Wail
entries: 60英尺范围内的每个生物如果能听到螃蟹的声音，就必须在一个{@dc 16}智慧救赎中成功，否则就会受到18({@damage 4d8})精神伤害。

rows.name: Stunning Wail
entries: 在60英尺范围内，每个能听到螃蟹声音的生物都必须做一个{@dc 16}宪法规定的投掷。如果失败，生物会受到9（（%1%））的雷霆伤害，并且在下一回合结束前会被（%2%）。成功时，一个生物会受到一半的伤害，并且不会有{@condition stunned}。
三个头像从蟹壳上垂下的破旧的帆和锚链上升起。当巨兽拍打它的爪子时，头像上描绘的少女开始哀嚎。
很少有怪物比破龙骨蟹更让水手们感到恐惧。这些巨大的甲壳类动物捕食浅水中的船只，并用留下的残骸来装饰它们的外壳。破浪蟹被运载魔法货物的船只以及经常装饰这些船只的被施了魔法的活人头像所吸引。

entries.name: Living Figureheads
entries: 龙骨断裂者的头像的哀嚎使大多数人听到后都会发疯。然而，从螃蟹身上找到的一个完整的头像可能会被说服，透露出一个隐藏的宝藏的位置，甚至是为它以前所装饰的船只的本土港口标出一条路线。

trait.name: Disperse
entries: 当海带鳗鱼被降低到0HP时，它就会分散到30英尺立方体的海带组件中。该区域为困难地形，持续1小时。在该小时结束时，海带鳗鱼会进行改造，恢复一半的hp并再次变得活跃。如果组成分散的海带鳗的一半以上的海带被移出水面并晒干，它就不能再复原，并且该生物会被摧毁。

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: 虽然海带鳗鱼保持不动，但它与普通的海带没有区别。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 海鳗用它的海带卷须进行两次攻击，使用Reel，并用它的猛击进行两次攻击。

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +8}击中，到达10英尺，一个生物。{@h}31 ({@damage 6d8 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Kelp Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +8}击中，达到50英尺，一个生物。{@h}目标是{@condition grappled}（逃跑{@dc 16}）。直到这个抓捕结束，目标是（%5%），海鳗不能对另一个目标使用相同的海带卷须。此外，在目标的下一个回合开始时，它开始窒息，因为海鳗的抓取力将它的呼吸压制住了。

action.name: Reel
entries: 海带鳗鱼将被它抓住的每个生物拉到25英尺的地方，直奔它而去。
一个由数以千计的海带叶片组成的粗大的蛇形生物在水面上升起。当该生物将自己缠绕在其无助的猎物身上时，飞出的叶片从主体上旋转起来。
海鳗是由人鱼族的奥术师意外创造的，他们希望保护他们的社区免受他们面临的无数威胁。他们试图让他们定居点附近的海带林活起来，缠住攻击者，让他们慢下来，足以让人鱼族击退他们。相反，第一条海带鳗鱼诞生了，因为海带的叶片把自己编织成巨大的鳗鱼形状，蹂躏了他们被创造出来保护的社区。

entries.name: Serpents of the Shallows
entries: 自从它们诞生以来，海带鳗鱼已经遍布整个海洋。有生命的海带森林生长在海洋浅滩上，对普通观察者来说与其他海洋丛林几乎没有区别。随着海带的成熟，叶片缠绕在海床上，并最终从其固定物中分离出来，成为一条完整的海带鳗鱼。然后，海带鳗鱼转移到一个无主的浅水区，试图创造一个新的森林。

entries.name: Mariners' Nightmares
entries: 海带鳗鱼的存在对那些以海洋为生的人来说是一种祸害。众所周知，贪婪的海鳗会掀翻船只，并将船上的人拖入水中的坟墓。海带缠绕的人形残骸在海带鳗鱼森林的地面上很常见。有经验的水手有时在接近海带森林时，会在水中放水，希望能吸引其他大型海洋捕食者来分散当地海带鳗鱼的注意力。

entries.name: Deep Hunters
entries: 虽然海带鳗鱼在较浅的水域生活和繁殖，但如果事实证明它们的森林附近的肥料稀少，它们在海洋深处捕食也是很常见的。知识渊博的海员知道，浅水区出现鲸鱼、鲨鱼和巨型鱿鱼的尸体可能是海带鳗鱼活动的一个指标。

trait.name: Nauseous Gas
entries: Kezai会产生一种微弱的、令人恶心的气体。任何在凯扎伊20英尺范围内的生物都必须成功地进行一次{@dc 14}体质测试，否则会受到2({@damage 1d4})的中毒伤害。Kezai周围20英尺内的区域会被稀薄的气体所遮蔽。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kezai进行三次攻击：一次用它的毒刺，两次用它的爪子。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Poison Barb
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit +6}击中，达到5英尺或范围30/120英尺，一个生物。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})的穿刺伤害，目标必须做一个{@dc 14}的宪法保护动作。如果失败，该生物会受到7({@damage 2d6})的毒药伤害，并在1分钟内处于{@condition poisoned}的状态。如果成功，该生物会受到一半的伤害，并且不会有（%7%）。该生物可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，成功时结束对自己的影响。当{@condition poisoned}这样做的时候，该生物在每个回合开始的时候会受到3({@damage 1d6})的毒药伤害。

action.name: Searing Acid {@recharge 6}
entries: Kezai的下颚滴下灼热的酸液，瞬间点燃它周围的气体。20英尺范围内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 14}灵巧的蓄力动作，如果蓄力失败会受到18({@damage 4d8})的火焰伤害，如果蓄力成功会受到一半的伤害。Kezai的恶心气体特性将在1分钟内失去作用。除非 "恶心之气 "已经激活至少1分钟，否则该怪兽不能使用 "灼热之气"。
这种生物看起来很像一只人类大小的蝎子，有宽大的带状翅膀。它卷曲的尾巴尖端有许多倒刺，可以滴下粘稠的毒药。

entries.name: Chemical Killing Machine
entries: Kezai是一种生活在炎热气候中的生物，对任何反对它的人发动化学战争。它从尾巴上释放出一种恶毒的毒液，涂抹在它投掷给敌人的倒刺上。如果这还不够致命，它还会自然产生一种稀薄的可燃气体，它可以用下颚附近的腺体产生的灼热化学物质点燃。幸运的是，对于那些遇到kezai的人来说，这个腺体作用缓慢，需要时间来产生点燃气体所需的化学物质。

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: 当khodumodumo保持不动，它与普通的土山没有区别。

trait.name: Impaling Tongues
entries: 霍德莫德莫在同一时间最多可以有六条刺穿的舌头。每个舌头都可以被攻击（AC20；15HP；对毒药和精神伤害免疫）。摧毁一个舌头不会对khodumodumo造成伤害。如果一个生物采取了行动，并且对它进行了{@dc 18}力量检查，那么舌头也可以被破坏。被破坏的舌头会在Khodumodumo完成长时间休息时重新生长。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 霍德莫德莫用它的舌头进行三次攻击，使用里尔，并用它的咬合进行一次攻击。

action.name: Bite
entries: 如果目标是被Khodumodumo抓捕的大型或小型生物，该生物会被吞噬，并且抓捕结束。当被吞噬时，该生物是{@condition blinded}和{@condition restrained}，它对khodumodumo以外的攻击和其他效果有完全的掩护，并且在khodumodumo的每个回合开始时受到21({@damage 6d6})酸伤害。
如果khodumodumo在一个回合内受到30次以上的伤害，khodumodumo必须在该回合结束时成功地进行一次{@dc 20}宪法救赎，或者反刍所有被吞食的生物，这些生物会在khodumodumo的10英尺内的空间里掉落{@condition prone}。如果khodumodumo死亡，被吞食的生物不再被它影响（%2%），可以用15英尺的移动距离逃离尸体，离开（%3%）。

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +11}击中，达到50英尺，一个生物。{@h}目标是{@condition grappled}（逃跑{@dc 18}）。直到这个抓取动作结束，目标是{@condition restrained}，并且khodumodumo不能对其他目标使用同样的舌头。此外，在目标的每个回合开始时，目标会受到8（（%6%））的穿刺伤害。

action.name: Reel
entries: Khodumodumo将它身边的每个生物（%0%）拉向它，最多直达25英尺。
这座山丘突然发芽，从周围升起，显示出一个看不见的、像蛤蟆一样的怪物，有一个空洞的大嘴。六条长长的红色舌头从这个口子里冒出来，每条都有一个人的躯干那么粗，末端是一个锋利的尖头。

entries.name: The Hills Have Tongues
entries: khodumodumo是它生活的山丘和坏境的顶级掠食者之一，它把自己伪装成一个中等大小的山丘，引诱生物靠近，然后把它们变成动画，用它的许多舌头刺死。虽然不邪恶，但霍杜莫杜莫是一个贪婪的捕食者，它不断地需要进食，并试图吞噬任何触手可及的东西。

entries.name: Rite of Passage
entries: 在单人战斗中杀死khodumodumo通常被认为是一个{@creature fire giant}寻求竞争一个部族领导权的成年仪式，特别是因为这种生物对火有天然抵抗力。强大的（1%）也被称为猎杀khodumodumos作为运动。

trait.name: Corrosive Mold
entries: 在奇里卡利边上开始其回合的生物，必须成功地进行{@dc 15}宪法救赎，否则会受到9({@damage 2d8})酸的伤害。

trait.name: Misty Veil
entries: kirikari在自己的30英尺范围内散发出淡淡的雾气。雾气随着kirikari移动，轻度遮蔽它周围的区域。如果被中速或更高速度的风（至少每小时10英里）吹散，雾气会在kirikari的下一回合开始时重新出现。

trait.name: Unseen Attacker
entries: 在它的每个回合中，kirikari可以使用一个额外的动作来进行（%0%）的行动。如果kirikari隐藏在一个生物中，并且用攻击击中它，目标会从攻击中受到额外的7（（%1%））的伤害。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 麒麟兽进行了两次猛烈的攻击。

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5})重击伤害加上9 ({@damage 2d8})酸液伤害。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +9}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}31({@damage 4d12 + 5})的穿刺伤害加上10({@damage 3d6})的毒药伤害，并且目标是{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 15})。直到这个抓取动作结束，目标是{@condition restrained}，而且基里凯利不能咬到其他目标。

action.name: Blinding Veil {@recharge 5}
entries: kirikari排出一团强化的迷雾，严重遮蔽了30英尺内的一切。在kirikari的下一个回合结束时，雾气会变稀薄，使该区域变得轻度遮蔽。
在一片迷雾的笼罩下，一个巨大的、类似蜈蚣的生物在沼泽中穿梭，它的下颚紧紧抓住一条狼獾的断尾。
每当非自然的雾气突然出现时，有人认为这是kirikari的迹象。虽然它们是罕见的独居生物，但由于其高度的攻击性和领土行为，kirikari被认为是非常危险的。

entries.name: Ambush Predators
entries: 很少有人能发现躲藏中的kirikari，因为它看起来不过是一棵隐藏在雾中的倒塌的树。它耐心地等待猎物靠近--然后以迅雷不及掩耳之势咬向猎物。

entries.name: Symbiotic Relationship
entries: 覆盖在kirikari身上的雾气来自于一种独特的霉菌，它附着在它的躯壳上。这种霉菌分泌出一种酸，在暴露在空气中后很快就会蒸发掉，对人体无害。kirikari利用这种雾气来隐藏自己，并使其猎物迷失方向。尽管是天生的游泳健将，kirikari倾向于避免在海水中游泳，因为接触到盐分会迅速杀死它的霉菌。

entries.name: Wyvern Hunters
entries: 虽然它的行为很不寻常，但kirikari已经被认为可以走到不可思议的距离去猎杀（%0）。一些学者推测，狼人体内的毒素是维持kirikari模具的必要组成部分。

trait.name: Bigger They Are
entries: 每回合一次，当堕落骑士用近战武器击中一个中等或较小的生物时，它可以造成一个额外的伤害。

trait.name: Harder They Fall
entries: 当堕落骑士受到致命一击的伤害时，它必须成功地进行灵巧救赎，其DC等于所受伤害，否则就会被击倒（%0%）。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 堕落骑士在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在救赎动作上有优势。

trait.name: Reckless
entries: 在它的回合开始时，堕落骑士可以在该回合内的所有近战武器攻击卷上获得优势，但对它的攻击卷也有优势，直到它下一回合开始。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: ab-errant骑士进行两次近战攻击：一次是用它的扫帚，一次是用它的拳头。

action.name: Sweeping Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4})重击伤害，目标必须成功进行{@dc 14}力量救赎，否则被击倒{@condition prone}。

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4})重击伤害。
一个具有超自然体质的人挥舞着他强大的锤子，就像一个孩子挥舞着倒下的树枝一样轻松和随意。在他破败的头巾下，旋转的符文和符号在一个不可能的肌肉框架上跳舞。
这些高大的庞然大物曾经是普通的战士，但却被萦绕在世界被遗忘和禁忌的地方的狂野和不可预测的魔法所祸害。

entries.name: Revised Beyond Recognition
entries: 也许一个圣骑士在击溃了来自星空之外的古老而不可知的力量后，从其追随者的地牢里领到了一个奖杯，慢慢地，这个奖杯改变了他。在激烈的战斗中，一个简单的剑客可能喝错了药水，被一个错误的巫师的实验性酿造物自发地改变了。无论他们的起源是什么，他们现在作为巨大的憎恶行走在这个世界上，被赋予了难以想象的力量，是对他们以前自我的讽刺。

entries.name: Born of Boons
entries: 尽管许多反常的骑士在接触到不可预测的奥术巫术后可能会被改变，但有些人是由神圣的魔法创造的。这些人可能是诡计多端的神的信徒，或者是那些特别残忍的神，或者他们可能以非正统的方式向无害的神灵祈祷，或者以其他方式想要。

entries.name: Knights Ab-errant in Midgard
entries: 越来越多的反常骑士被看到漫无目的地游荡在米德加德的西部荒原上，他们穿着布尔贡德的白骑士服。无论这些人是在接触到附近堕落的魔法阵的堕落能量后转变的，还是在过于接近恐惧行者的阴影后转变的，或者是通过Bemmea的分离主义法师的阴谋，他们渴望摆脱对骑士的奴役束缚，Bourgund试图根除这些明显与他们骄傲的王国联系的异类。

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: 在它的每个回合中，咒术师可以使用一个额外的行动来进行（%0%）、（%1%）或（%2%）的行动。

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: 如果哥布林的盟友中至少有一人在生物的5英尺范围内，而盟友不在该生物的5英尺范围内，则哥布林对该生物的攻击卷有优势（%0%）。

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: 在阳光下时，哥布林在攻击卷轴上有劣势，在依靠视觉的智慧（（%0%））检查上也是如此。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 哥布林法术师是一个2级法术师。它的法术能力是智力（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击击中（%1%））。它有以下的巫师法术准备。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 哥布林法术师进行两次近战攻击。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit +4}击中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺伤害。
从深深的兜帽中探出的爬行动物的鼻子是唯一的提示，表明这个隐身的人物是一个哥布林。脖子上挂着一个獠牙吊饰，哥布林去做它的秘密和低语的生意。

entries.name: Agents of the Empire
entries: 哥布林咒语员主要是作为龙之帝国间谍网络的信使和代理人工作。他们擅长代码编写和破解，监督其他外勤人员的行动，并为他们的统治者提供对敌人内部事务的宝贵窥视。

entries.name: Trusted Messengers
entries: 哥布林法术师经常被授予使用帮助加密和发送消息的魔法物品，以补充他们的自然技能和魔法研究。他们携带或编写的信息往往对秘密活动具有重大意义。

entries.name: Kobold Spellclerks in Midgard
entries: 拼写员在玛洛蒂帝国的间谍网络中作为最低级别的间谍运作，该网络由隐者帕西和卡-维兹尔-泽基-哈桑-艾斯基共同管理。尽管他们的地位较低，但他们对间谍网络的重要性丝毫不减，并构成了马洛蒂海外间谍的大多数。在国内，人们对咒语员既尊重又戒备，因为在帝国内部，这些间谍也经常被用来铲除那些在龙族统治下感到不安的人。
米德加德的哥布林法术师通常会准备（%0%）来代替（%1%），准备（%2%）来代替（%3%）。这两种法术都可以在（%4%）中找到。

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: 哥布林战争机器对任何会改变其形态的法术或效果都是免疫的。

trait.name: Operators
entries: 哥布林战争机器每回合可以采取行动或按其速度移动，不能同时进行。战争机器最多可以容纳三个小操作员。如果它至少有一个操作者，只要操作者花了整个回合来操作战争机器，它就可以正常移动和行动。当它有一个以上的操作者时，只要额外的操作者花整个回合来操作战争机器，它就有额外的特性。
如果一个生物对哥布林战争机器取得关键一击，该生物可以用攻击的目标代替其中一个操作员。否则，操作者不能成为目标，并且在操作哥布林战争机器时，对伤害免疫。

trait.name: Ram Them! (Two or More Operators)
entries: 如果哥布林战争机器向一个目标移动至少15英尺，然后在同一回合用尖刺轮攻击击中它，目标会受到额外的11（（%0%））穿刺伤害。如果目标是一个生物，它必须在一个{@dc 16}力量救赎中成功，否则会被击倒{@condition prone}。

trait.name: Siege Monster.
entries: 哥布林战争机器对物体和结构造成双重伤害。

trait.name: That Way! (Three or More Operators)
entries: 哥布林战争机器可以在它的每个回合中采取{@action Dash}或{@action Disengage}的行动作为额外行动。

action.name: Multiattack.
entries: 哥布林战争机器会进行两次尖刺轮攻击。或者，它可以进行三次吐火攻击。

action.name: Spiked Wheel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Spit Fire
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +6}击中，范围120英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 4d6})火灾伤害。

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: 哥布林战争机器在30英尺的范围内喷出火焰。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 16}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到35({@damage 10d6})的火焰伤害，蓄力成功则受到一半的伤害。
一团火在巨大的龙族机器的大嘴里燃烧着。哥布林狂热的叫声在内部回荡，高于机器的引擎声。

受到可怕的{@creature one-headed clockwork dragon|CCodex|clockwork dragon}({@loader Creature Codex|collection/Kobold Press; Creature Codex.json})的启发，一些对工程有了解的哥布林走到一起，铸造了他们自己的具有强大力量的龙形武器。当战争机器在他们身边滚动时，哥布林感到不可阻挡，导致他们采取更大胆（而且往往更成功）的风险。

entries.name: Hard to Operate
entries: 哥布林战争机器通常由三个哥布林操纵。虽然这台机器是哥布林工程的一个奇迹，但它很难控制，而且它的顺利运行也经常因为其工作人员的争吵而受到影响，就像它不稳定的结构一样。

entries.name: Draconic Machine
entries: 由于其创造的某些怪癖，哥布林战争机器表现出一些龙人的个性特征。潜入战斗或追寻宝藏时，它的行动力更强，如果由一个经常在别人面前夸奖它的操作者来处理，它很少出现问题。相反，当被指示撤退时，它的反应很慢。

entries.name: Construct Nature
entries: 哥布林的战争机器不需要空气、食物、饮料或睡眠。

trait.name: Fire Absorption
entries: 每当羊脂球受到火灾伤害时，它不会受到任何伤害，反而会恢复与所受火灾伤害相等的hp数。

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: 狼牙棒可以在1英寸宽的空间内移动而不被挤压。在5英尺范围内，触及羔羊巫妖或用近战攻击击中它的生物会受到5（（%0%））的火焰伤害。此外，羔羊巫妖可以进入一个敌对生物的空间并停在那里。它在一个回合中第一次进入一个生物的空间时，该生物会受到5({@damage 1d10})的火力伤害并着火；直到有人采取行动将火浇灭，该生物在每个回合开始时都会受到5({@damage 1d10})的火力伤害。

trait.name: Illumination
entries: 炽热的巫妖在半径30英尺的范围内发出亮光，在另外30英尺的范围内发出暗光。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 炽热的女巫飞鸟进行了三次炽热的触摸攻击。

action.name: Blazing Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3})火灾伤害。如果目标是生物或易燃物，会被点燃。在生物采取行动浇灭火焰之前，目标在其每个回合开始时受到5({@damage 1d10})的火焰伤害。如果一个生物被这个攻击杀死，羔羊巫妖会重新获得与所受伤害相等的hp。被此攻击杀死的生物的身体会变成灰烬，连同它所穿着或携带的任何非魔法物品。该生物只能通过{@spell resurrection}或{@spell wish}的法术来恢复生命。
一个纯蓝色的火的生物在洞穴地板上淌过，燃烧并吞噬了除石头以外的所有东西。
虽然它的行为与侵扰地下区域的渗出物相似，但羊脂球是由活的蓝色火焰组成，而不是原生质。就像液态火一样，它沿着地面流动，寻找食物，对于羊脂球来说，它是任何可以燃烧的有机物。

entries.name: Arcane or Alien Origins
entries: 羔羊巫妖的确切起源不详。一些贤者推测，这是一个巫师早期的尝试，他想在物质世界的生命中注入元素的精华。其他人则推测它是在一个星外生物上进行法术实验的灾难性副产品。无论真相如何，这些奇怪的生物已经繁殖和扩散，对那些探索世界深处洞穴的人构成了致命的危险。

entries.name: Reproduction
entries: 当一只羊脂球消耗了足够的有机物，它就会寻找一个孤立的地方进行繁殖。然后，它将自己分成两个新的羔羊巫妖，每一个都以父母的一半命中率开始。然后，这些后代各奔东西，寻找更多的生命来吞噬。

trait.name: Lava Dribble
entries: 每个在熔岩守卫者5英尺范围内的生物都必须做一个{@dc 19}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到7({@damage 2d6})的火焰伤害，蓄力成功则受到一半的伤害。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 熔岩守卫者与生俱来的法术能力是智慧（法术保存（%0%））。它可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何材料成分。

1e: {@spell conjure elemental} ({@creature earth elemental|mm|earth} or {@creature fire elemental} only)

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 熔岩守卫者进行四次猛烈攻击。或者，它可以使用它的熔岩球两次。

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +13}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7})重击伤害。

action.name: Lava Lob
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +13}击中，范围60/240英尺，一个目标。{@h}21 ({@damage 6d6})火力伤害，目标必须在{@dc 19}灵巧救赎中成功，否则在下一回合开始时受到10 ({@damage 3d6})火力伤害。

action.name: Fumarole {@recharge 5}
entries: 熔岩守卫者肩膀之间的火山口喷发出一缕火焰、岩石和毒烟。每个在熔岩守卫者60英尺范围内的生物都必须做一个{@dc 19}体质测试。如果失败，生物会受到21({@damage 6d6})重击伤害和21({@damage 6d6})火焰伤害，并在1分钟内变成{@condition poisoned}。成功时，生物会受到一半的伤害，并且不会变成{@condition poisoned}。一个{@condition poisoned}的目标可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，成功时结束对它的影响。爆发将熔岩守卫者包围在一个半径为20英尺的烟雾球中，被视为严重遮蔽，直到其下一回合结束。中等或更高速度的风（至少每小时10英里）会驱散这些烟雾。
一条熔岩小河从这个四臂火山生物的肩膀之间的空洞中流淌出来。

entries.name: Volcanic Guardians
entries: 熔岩守护者是来自土元素界和火元素界之间的元素体。他们有时会通过火山中心的自发元素漩涡出现在物质界。一旦到了物质界，他们发现自己被困住了。他们并不横冲直撞，而是充当他们出现的地区的守护者，希望有一天他们能够回家。

entries.name: Noble Elementals
entries: 熔岩守护者是蝾螈和其他混沌元素的天敌。他们对自己堕落的兄弟（%0%）感到羞愧和怜悯，并不遗余力地制止他们遇到的任何珍宝。

entries.name: Gods of the Mount
entries: 熔岩守护者有时会受到生活在火山地区的原始人类的崇拜。这些人类向熔岩守护者进贡，作为回报，熔岩守护者驱赶有害的怪物，并引导熔岩流动，以促进新的生命和保持健康的土壤。双方很少拥有相互沟通的手段，熔岩守护者往往对部落的真正目标或动机知之甚少。虽然熔岩守护者并不邪恶，但他对生命的概念与大多数人类并不一样，而且很少干预对生物的牺牲。然而，在熔岩守护者发现他们可以互相交谈后，牺牲者被他们的熔岩守护者拯救的故事比比皆是。

entries.name: Elemental Nature
entries: 熔岩守护者不需要空气、食物、饮料或睡眠。

trait.name: Glowing Eye
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，拉扎维克使它的单眼闪耀着明亮的金光。它的眼睛在一条长90英尺、宽5英尺的直线上发出亮光，或者在一个30英尺的圆锥体上发出亮光。在拉扎维克的眼睛所照亮的区域内的每个生物都会获得拉扎维克的沼泽步法特性，只要它还在被照亮的路上。拉扎维克可以在任何时候熄灭它的光芒（不需要行动）。

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: 拉扎维克可以憋气30分钟。

trait.name: Speak with Beasts
entries: 拉扎维克人可以与野兽交流，就像他们有共同的语言一样。

trait.name: Swamp Stride
entries: 由泥土、芦苇或其他沼泽地组成的困难地形不会使拉扎维克损失额外的移动能力。此外，它可以通过非魔法危险，例如（%0%），而不被它们所阻碍，也可以通过非魔法植物而不被它们所伤害，尽管有刺，有骨刺，或有类似的危险。

action.name: Reed Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Eye Flare {@recharge 5}
entries: 拉扎维克的眼睛在15英尺的范围内发出刺眼的光。该区域内的每个生物都要做一个{@dc 13}灵巧的蓄力动作。如果失败，生物会受到10({@damage 3d6})的辐射伤害，并在1分钟内被{@condition blinded}。成功时，生物会受到一半的伤害，并且不会有{@condition blinded}。该生物可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，成功时结束对自身的影响。
这个小人形站起来不比一只猫高，有一把雪白的胡须和一只闪烁着金色光芒的单眼。他手里拿着一根长长的芦苇鞭子。

entries.name: Swamp-Dwelling Fey
entries: 拉扎维克是一种主要居住在沼泽地的精灵，它们挑选特定的沼泽地作为家园。当它选择了一个合适的地方，拉扎维克就会用干枯的芦苇、泥巴和树枝为自己建造一个小小的小屋，它整天都在捕鱼，享受当地的动物和善良的费恩的陪伴。所有的拉扎维克都是雄性，被认为像芦苇一样从潮湿的土壤中发芽，尽管雌性{@creature korrigan|ccodex|korrigans}({@loader Creature Codex|collection/Kobold Press; Creature Codex.json})和拉扎维克之间的恋情并不罕见，有时会产生后代。

entries.name: Glowing Guides
entries: 拉扎维克讨厌看到任何人陷入困境，并利用该地区的动物来监视那些处于自然沼泽危险或邪恶怪物危险中的生物。当它发现有危险的生物时，拉扎维克会用它发光的眼睛把它们引向安全地带或防止它们迷路，但它更喜欢尽可能地让自己不被人看到。拉扎维克憎恨邪恶的沼泽怪物，如{@creature green hag|mm|green hags}和{@creature miremal|tob|miremals}({@loader Tome of Beasts|creature/Kobold Press; Tome of Beasts.json})，但它们对{@creature will-o'-wisp|mm|will-o'-wisps}的仇恨最大。他们经常被混淆为巫师，这导致了他们原本平静的生活出现了复杂的情况。

monster.name: Virtuoso Lich
languages: plus up to two other languages

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
entries: 如果巫师的拯救动作失败，它可以选择成功。

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: 如果它有一个法器，被摧毁的巫妖会在{@dice 1d10}天内获得一个新的身体，恢复所有的命中率并再次变得活跃。新的身体会出现在法器的5英尺范围内。

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: 巫师对任何变成不死之身的效果在救赎动作上有优势。

trait.name: Versatile Artist
entries: 在每次长休结束时，巫妖会选择一种艺术表现形式，如歌曲、诗歌、舞蹈、时装、绘画或类似的东西。在完成长期休息之前，巫师对一种与艺术表现形式有关的伤害有免疫力。例如，通过歌曲或诗歌表达艺术的巫师对雷霆伤害有免疫力，通过时装表达艺术的巫师对砍杀伤害有免疫力，而通过绘画表达艺术的巫师对酸液伤害有免疫力。这种特性不能使巫师对力量、精神或辐射伤害免疫。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 巫师是一个12级的施法者。它的法术能力是魅力（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击击中（%1%））。它有以下的吟游诗人法术准备。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 巫师使用它的腐化艺术。然后它进行了两次艺术性繁荣的攻击。

action.name: Artistic Flourish
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit +9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5})用多才多艺特质伤害选择的类型。

action.name: Corrupted Art
entries: 巫师哼着不和谐的旋律，在空中画出一个摇摇欲坠的死亡符号，表演一个扭曲现实的回旋舞，或者模仿其他腐朽或扭曲的艺术表现，并以它能看到的60英尺内的一个生物为目标。这个动作的效果会改变，取决于目标是否是亡灵。

items.name: Non-Undead.
items.entry: 目标必须做一个{@dc 16}宪法救赎，救赎失败时受到18({@damage 4d8})的坏死伤害，救赎成功时受到一半的伤害。

items.name: Undead.
items.entry: 目标恢复18({@damage 4d8})点命中。超过驳船最大马力的治疗成为临时命中率。

action.name: Call Muse
entries: 巫师的目标是30英尺范围内它能看到的一个人形或兽形。该目标必须在一个{@dc 17}的智慧救赎中成功，否则就会被巫师{@condition charmed}攻击1分钟。目标是巫师的 "缪斯"，其速度为0，在观看或聆听巫师的艺术表达时，速度为3%。缪斯可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对自己的影响。如果一个生物的救赎成功或效果结束，该生物在接下来的24小时内将对巫师的召唤缪斯免疫。如果缪斯受到巫师的伤害，它就不再是（%4%）。
巫师在同一时间只能有一个缪斯。如果它对另一个人施展魅力，对前一个缪斯的效果就会结束。如果巫师在其缪斯的30英尺范围内，并能看到其缪斯，那么巫师在每轮对非其缪斯的生物进行的第一次艺术性的攻击中具有优势。

legendary.name: Artistic Flourish
entries: 巫师进行一次艺术化的攻击。

legendary.name: Move
entries: 巫师的移动速度达到了它的速度，而不需要挑衅（%0%）。

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: 巫师从其准备好的法术列表中施放一个法术，如常使用一个法术槽。

legendary.name: Unrestrained Art (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: 巫师将其艺术天赋的全部力量释放给附近的人。每个在巫师10英尺范围内的生物必须做一个{@dc 16}灵巧的蓄力动作。如果失败，生物会受到18（（1%））的伤害，伤害类型为多才多艺特性选择的类型，并被击倒（2%）。成功时，生物会受到一半的伤害，并且不被击倒（%3%）。
美丽的歌手向崇拜的人群鞠躬，然后走到幕布后面。在远离人群视线的地方，歌手改变了它的半面面具，短暂地露出了一个可怕的、不死的面孔。
一个技艺高超的巫师是一个艺术家，他对艺术的热爱使其在死后仍能维持。

entries.name: Birthed by Art
entries: 当一个在艺术和魔法表达方面都很强大的艺术家死后还没有完成艺术时，就会产生一个技艺精湛的巫师。这样的艺术家往往在完成或创造出杰作之前就死了，而未完成的艺术的折磨与艺术家强大的魔法天赋相结合，将艺术家变成了技艺精湛的巫师。一个技艺高超的巫师会被绑在一件艺术品上，比如最喜欢的乐器、绘画、舞鞋、羽毛笔，或者其他一些对巫师生前有意义的艺术表达物。这件艺术品就是巫师的法器。

entries.name: Beautiful Mien
entries: 一个技艺高超的巫师保持着它前世的美丽，看起来和它生前一样--除了一个暴露其不死性质的身体特征。这个不死的特征可以是一只带爪子的骷髅手，巫师把它藏在手套里；一条僵硬的、像僵尸一样的腿，巫师用长袍和手杖来伪装；一张被不死之身蹂躏的脸，巫师用美丽的面具遮住；或者任何其他合适的特征。

entries.name: Undead Nature
entries: 巫师不需要空气、食物、饮料或睡眠。

entries.name: A Virtuoso Lich's Lair
entries: 一个技艺高超的巫师选择了一个具有艺术潜力的巢穴，无论这个巢穴是一个具有自然声学的古老洞穴，还是一个具有丰富自然光的草地，一个镜子大厅，或者其他能够增强某种艺术形式的地方，都能让巫师的魔法和艺术表现力膨胀，到达每个角落。

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 麟毛虫可以呼吸空气和水。

trait.name: Blood Scent
entries: 麟毛虫可以闻到周围5英里内水中的血腥味。它可以确定血液是新鲜的还是陈旧的，以及什么类型的生物流出的血液。此外，在寻找或追踪没有全部hp的生物时，灵虫在智慧（（%0%））和智慧（（%1%））的检查中具有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 麟兽可以使用它的 "恐怖存在"。然后它进行三次攻击：一次是用它的咬，两次是用它的尾巴。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +12}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7})穿刺伤害加上14 ({@damage 4d6})坏死伤害。

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +12}击中，到达20英尺，一个目标。{@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7})重击伤害，目标是{@condition grappled}(如果是大型或小型生物，且灵兽没有其他两个生物{@condition grappled}，则逃逸{@dc 18}。直到这个抓捕结束，目标是（%7%）。

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: 每一个在林纳虫120英尺范围内的林纳虫所选择的生物，如果意识到它的存在，必须在一个{@dc 16}的智慧救赎中成功，否则就会变成{@condition frightened}，持续1分钟。一个生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复这个蓄力动作，如果成功则结束对它的影响。如果该生物的蓄力投掷成功或效果结束，该生物在接下来的24小时内对林纳姆的恐怖存在免疫。

action.name: Inky Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: 麟角兽在60英尺的范围内呼出一团卤水墨水。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 19}体质测试。如果失败，生物会受到52({@damage 15d6})的坏死伤害，并在1分钟内被{@condition blinded}。成功时，生物会受到一半的伤害，并且不会（%3%）。一个{@condition blinded}的生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，成功时结束对它的影响。
这只巨大的爬行动物在水中翱翔，长而光滑。它强大的尾巴有节奏地起伏着，威胁着它身后的一切。

entries.name: Terrors of the Deep
entries: 风口林蛙生活在位于海洋最深处的热液裂缝附近。当它们不捕食时，可以发现它们在巢穴中晒太阳，享受它们家园的黑暗、温暖的水域。它们是熟练的猎手，食物包括各种鲨鱼和鲸鱼、巨型乌贼、{@creature dragon turtle|mm|dragon turtles}、{@creature dragon eel|ToB|dragon eels}({@loader Tome of Beasts|creature/Kobold Press; Tome of Beasts.json})和{@creature young sea dragon|ToB|younger sea dragons}({@loader Tome of Beasts|creature/Kobold Press; Tome of Beasts.json})。虽然它们通常是独居动物，但交配的一对有时会联手猎杀古海龙和海怪，然后再恢复独居生活。

entries.name: Primeval Dragons
entries: 就像它们的龙族亲戚一样，通风口林恩虫喜欢收集大量的财宝，并将其埋在它们巢穴的淤泥中。年轻的林恩虫把大部分时间花在搜寻沉船的残骸上，而年长的林恩虫则主动击沉过往的船只，在闲暇时吃掉水手并捡起掉落的财宝。

entries.name: Aboleth Hunters
entries: 通过聪明和诡计，{@creature aboleth|mm|aboleths}经常支配发泄灵兽，作为仆人和战兽使用，并乐此不疲。对他们来说，linnorms鄙视奴役他们的aboleths。如果一个通风口的林纳姆意识到有aboleths的存在，就会立即停止其当前的活动，并采取行动消灭其仇恨的敌人。

trait.name: Expert Lockpicker
entries: 锁匠可以使用其机械身体的任何一块来开锁和解除陷阱，就像它的整个身体是由几组（%0%）组成的。它精通于以这种方式使用自己的碎片。此外，锁匠在开锁和解除陷阱的能力检查中具有优势。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 锁匠与生俱来的法术能力是智力（法术保存（%0%））。它可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何材料成分。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 锁匠进行了两次钥匙刀攻击。

action.name: Key Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5})砍击伤害。

action.name: Acid Wash {@recharge 5}
entries: 锁匠在60英尺的范围内散发出一股铁锈云。该区域内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 16}灵巧的救赎中成功，救赎失败时受到35({@damage 10d6})酸的伤害，救赎成功时受到一半的伤害。
这个人形建筑是一个由机械部件拼凑而成的集合。悬挂在它身上的数百个钥匙随着它的移动而叮当响。

entries.name: Call the Locksmith
entries: 这些奇怪的实体在创建安全的门和门，不可逾越的障碍物和各种锁的业务中是最好的。他们可能倾向于从一个地方游荡到另一个地方，或在大都市开店，提供他们的服务，创建或解锁任何种类的障碍。

entries.name: Professional Rivalry
entries: 每个锁匠都有独特的外表和个性，但他们都有相同的技能。锁匠一眼就能认出锁匠的手艺。当一个锁匠遇到另一个同类建造的障碍物时，它就会被迫打破这个障碍物或建造一个更好的版本。被雇来拆除其同伴的工作的锁匠往往自愿免费完成这项任务。

entries.name: Key Features
entries: 锁匠的外表很独特，但都有一个普遍的人形。无论其他细节如何，他们都拥有空的钥匙孔，而人类的鼻子通常会在这里。适合这把锁的钥匙负责将锁匠的意识注入其中。锁匠们建造了极其复杂的隐藏式金库来藏匿这些珍贵的钥匙。

entries.name: Construct Nature
entries: 锁匠不需要空气、食物、饮料或睡眠。

trait.name: Leech Luck
entries: 如果幸运水蛭60英尺范围内的生物在能力检查、攻击卷或蓄力投掷中得到20分，幸运水蛭会获得1个幸运点。它一次不能拥有超过4个幸运点。

trait.name: Reserve of Fortune
entries: 如果幸运水蛭在日落时没有4点幸运值，它就会获得2点幸运值。它一次不能有超过4点的运气值。此外，如果幸运水蛭在拥有至少1个幸运点的情况下，在攻击卷、能力检查或蓄力投掷的D20上掷出1，它可以重掷骰子，并且必须使用新的骰子。这个特性不需要消耗运气值。

trait.name: Turn Luck
entries: 作为一个额外的行动，幸运水蛭可以花费1个幸运点来。

items: 在其下一次攻击或蓄力时获得优势
Cast {@spell misty step}
使其下一次成功的咬合武器攻击的坏死伤害额外增加9（（%0%））。
迫使周围60英尺范围内正在集中精力施法的每个生物做一个{@dc 16}宪法救赎，如果失败则失去对法术的注意力。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 运气水蛭进行两次咬人的手臂攻击。

action.name: Biting Arms
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +9}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5})穿刺伤害加上9 ({@damage 2d8})坏死伤害。

action.name: Feast of Fortune {@recharge 6}
entries: 每个幸运水蛭能看到的30英尺范围内的生物都必须做一个{@dc 16}的魅力拯救动作。如果失败，该生物会受到27({@damage 6d8})的精神伤害，变得{@condition blinded}直到下一回合结束，并被诅咒{@condition falling fortunes|ToB2}。成功时，生物会受到一半的伤害，并且不会被（%4%）或诅咒。每有一个失败的生物，幸运水蛭就会获得1点幸运值。
这个精灵般的生物站了起来，它明亮的绿色眼睛闪烁着威胁的光芒。短小的、不怀好意的角从它墨色的头发中探出头来，绿色的烟雾从它手臂上的无数圆口中渗出。

When a humanoid who earned wealth through violence and duplicity gets lost in the Shadow Realm, its body becomes corrupted by the dark realm, turning it into a luck leech. These fey have arms covered in lamprey-like mouths that drain the luck out of their victims. They return to the Material Plane and stalk gambling houses and criminal underbellies for exceptionally lucky targets.

entries.name: Amassing Fortune
entries: Luck leeches obsess over gathering as much wealth and luck as possible, referring to both collectively as "fortune." They rarely notice and never care if their acquisition of fortune harms others.

entries.name: Self-Serving
entries: A luck leech cares first and foremost about itself. If it thinks its life is in danger, it expends any fortune it has to escape, knowing it can't enjoy its fortune if it's dead.

entries.name: Curse: Falling Fortunes
entries: 一个被诅咒了的生物会在24小时内被厄运所困扰。在被诅咒期间，该生物不能在任何攻击卷或能力检查中加入其熟练度加成。如果被诅咒的生物在攻击卷或能力检查中得到20分，则诅咒结束。另外，诅咒可以通过一个（%0%）的咒语或类似的魔法提前解除。

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the lunarchidna has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the lunarchidna can take the {@action Hide} action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The lunarchidna can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lunarchidna makes one bite attack and two claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or its hp maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hp maximum to 0.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})砍击伤害。

A four-armed, four-legged creature in the vague shape of a human—but seemingly made of fine spider silk—moves down a tree, slowly chanting the incantation of a spell in the pale light of the full moon.

entries.name: Made in Corrupt Forests
entries: Lunarchidnas are beings of moonlight and spider silk created in forests permeated by residual dark magic. When this magic coalesces on a spider web touched by the light of a full moon, the web animates. The web gains life and flies through the forest, gathering other webs until it collects enough silk to form a faceless, humanoid body, with four legs and four arms.

entries.name: Hatred of Elves
entries: Lunarchidnas hate elves and love to make the creatures suffer. They poison water sources, set fire to villages, and bait monsters into stampeding through elf communities. These aberrations especially enjoy stealing away elf children to use as bait to trap the adults that come to the rescue.

entries.name: Cyclical Power
entries: The lunarchidna's power is tied to the moon. When the skies are dark during a new moon, the lunarchidna becomes more shadow than living web. Its mental ability dulls, and it becomes barely more than a savage animal. When a full moon brightens the night, however, the lunarchidna becomes a conduit of lunar light and can channel that power through its body. Using its heightened intellect, it makes plans, writes notes, and plots from the safety of the trees where it makes its home. In the intermittent phases of the moon, the lunarchidna is a more than capable hunter, trapping and devouring prey it encounters while retaining enough knowledge of its plans and magic to further its goals in minor ways. The lunarchidna's statistics change cyclically as shown on the Lunarchidna Moon Phase table.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The lunarchidna can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the lunarchidna has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The lunarchidna ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lunarchidna is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). The lunarchidna has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lunarchidna makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws. If the lunarchidna hits a Medium or smaller target with both attacks on the same turn, the target is {@condition restrained} by webbing and the lunarchidna uses Wrap Up.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or its hp maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hp maximum to 0.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Web {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +5} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} by webbing. As an action the restrained target can make a {@dc 13} Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

action.name: Wrap Up
entries: The lunarchidna wraps up a Medium or smaller creature {@condition restrained} by webbing. The wrapped target is {@condition blinded}, {@condition restrained}, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw at the start of each of the lunarchidna's turns or take 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. The webbing can be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 15; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage). The lunarchidna can have only one creature wrapped at a time.

A four-armed, four-legged creature in the vague shape of a human—but seemingly made of fine spider silk—moves down a tree, slowly chanting the incantation of a spell in the pale light of the full moon.

entries.name: Made in Corrupt Forests
entries: Lunarchidnas are beings of moonlight and spider silk created in forests permeated by residual dark magic. When this magic coalesces on a spider web touched by the light of a full moon, the web animates. The web gains life and flies through the forest, gathering other webs until it collects enough silk to form a faceless, humanoid body, with four legs and four arms.

entries.name: Hatred of Elves
entries: Lunarchidnas hate elves and love to make the creatures suffer. They poison water sources, set fire to villages, and bait monsters into stampeding through elf communities. These aberrations especially enjoy stealing away elf children to use as bait to trap the adults that come to the rescue.

entries.name: Cyclical Power
entries: The lunarchidna's power is tied to the moon. When the skies are dark during a new moon, the lunarchidna becomes more shadow than living web. Its mental ability dulls, and it becomes barely more than a savage animal. When a full moon brightens the night, however, the lunarchidna becomes a conduit of lunar light and can channel that power through its body. Using its heightened intellect, it makes plans, writes notes, and plots from the safety of the trees where it makes its home. In the intermittent phases of the moon, the lunarchidna is a more than capable hunter, trapping and devouring prey it encounters while retaining enough knowledge of its plans and magic to further its goals in minor ways. The lunarchidna's statistics change cyclically as shown on the Lunarchidna Moon Phase table.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lunarchidna is a 8th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The lunarchidna has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Light Invisibility
entries: The lunarchidna is {@condition invisible} while in bright or dim light.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The lunarchidna can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the lunarchidna has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The lunarchidna ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lunarchidna makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or its hp maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hp maximum to 0.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Web {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +6} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} by webbing. As an action the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 13} Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

action.name: Lunar Beam {@recharge 5}
entries: The lunarchidna flashes a beam of moonlight in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A four-armed, four-legged creature in the vague shape of a human—but seemingly made of fine spider silk—moves down a tree, slowly chanting the incantation of a spell in the pale light of the full moon.

entries.name: Made in Corrupt Forests
entries: Lunarchidnas are beings of moonlight and spider silk created in forests permeated by residual dark magic. When this magic coalesces on a spider web touched by the light of a full moon, the web animates. The web gains life and flies through the forest, gathering other webs until it collects enough silk to form a faceless, humanoid body, with four legs and four arms.

entries.name: Hatred of Elves
entries: Lunarchidnas hate elves and love to make the creatures suffer. They poison water sources, set fire to villages, and bait monsters into stampeding through elf communities. These aberrations especially enjoy stealing away elf children to use as bait to trap the adults that come to the rescue.

entries.name: Cyclical Power
entries: The lunarchidna's power is tied to the moon. When the skies are dark during a new moon, the lunarchidna becomes more shadow than living web. Its mental ability dulls, and it becomes barely more than a savage animal. When a full moon brightens the night, however, the lunarchidna becomes a conduit of lunar light and can channel that power through its body. Using its heightened intellect, it makes plans, writes notes, and plots from the safety of the trees where it makes its home. In the intermittent phases of the moon, the lunarchidna is a more than capable hunter, trapping and devouring prey it encounters while retaining enough knowledge of its plans and magic to further its goals in minor ways. The lunarchidna's statistics change cyclically as shown on the Lunarchidna Moon Phase table.

trait.name: Descendant of The Moon
entries: Magical light created by the lunarian can't be extinguished.

trait.name: Major Surface Curse
entries: A lunarian can never be in the presence of natural light. It takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage at the beginning of its turn if it is exposed to direct moonlight or sunlight. If this damage reduces the lunarian to 0 hp, it dies and turns to moondust.

trait.name: Moon-Touched Weapons
entries: The lunarian's weapon attacks are magical. When the lunarian hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage (included in the attack). A creature that takes radiant damage from a lunarian's weapon sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius for 1 hour.

trait.name: Summon Shadowbeam {@recharge 6}
entries: As a bonus action, the lunarian summons a beam of pale light, shot through with undulating waves of shadow, centered on a point it can see within 60 feet of it. The beam is a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder and lasts for 1 minute. As a bonus action on each of its turns, the lunarian can move the beam up to 20 feet in any direction. A creature that enters or starts its turn in the beam must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage and is cursed with the {@condition minor surface curse|ToB2}. On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn't cursed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lunarian makes two halberd attacks.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage.

A grey humanoid wearing a dark tattered cloak and worn armor descends on glimmering, mothlike wings. In its hands it wields a halberd tipped with a cold light. Its black lidless eyes are filled with envy and sorrow.

entries.name: Condemned to the Dark
entries: Lunarians are a race of mothlike fey originally from the moon. However, after attempting to take the moon's power for themselves, they were cast out by a fey lord and damned to the depths of the world, never to see their lunar home again.

entries.name: Angels of the Underworld
entries: Stories tell of lunarians helping people far below the surface, striking down monsters at the last moment. However, they never do so for free, often demanding valuable trinkets from the surface as payment for their services. If those they rescue deny them a reward or give them a bad one, they are prone to attack.

entries.name: Curse: Minor Surface Curse
entries: 被轻微表面诅咒的生物在暴露于自然光下时会感到疼痛。当被诅咒并在阳光或月光下时，该生物在攻击卷和智慧（（%0%））检查中处于劣势。如果受影响的生物在黑暗中完成了长时间的休息，则诅咒结束。另外，诅咒可以通过一个{@spell remove curse}的咒语或类似的魔法提前解除。

entries.name: Lunarians in Midgard
entries: In Midgard, lunarians are hunted by the {@creature lunar devil|ToB|lunar devils} ({@loader Tome of Beasts|creature/Kobold Press; Tome of Beasts.json}) of the {@creature Moonlit King|ToB} ({@loader Tome of Beasts|creature/Kobold Press; Tome of Beasts.json}) . The ephemeral fey lord takes great offense at the creatures' existence and considers them a threat to the Moon Tower and what power remains there. Should mortals wish to gain favor with the Moonlit King, the pale wings of the lunarian make a fitting gift.

monster.name: Wereowl

walk.condition: (fly 30 ft. in hybrid form, fly 60 ft. in owl form)

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

languages: Giant Owl (can't speak in humanoid form)

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The wereowl has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The wereowl can use its action to polymorph into an owl-humanoid hybrid or into a giant owl, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Silent Flight (Hybrid or Owl Form Only)
entries: The wereowl has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks when it flies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: In owl form, the wereowl makes two talon attacks. In humanoid form, it makes three shortbow or shortsword attacks. In hybrid form, it can attack like an owl or a humanoid.

action.name: Shortsword (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talon (Hybrid or Owl Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wereowl {@footnote lycanthropy|A {@spell remove curse} spell can rid an afflicted lycanthrope of the curse. {@note For further information, refer to the {@i Info} tab of the {@creature werewolf} bestiary entry.}}.

action.name: Shortbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.
This feathered humanoid has piercing eyes, larger than normal for a humanoid's head, set around a sharp beak. Wings spread from its arms, and its feet end in wicked talons.

A wereowl is a hybrid creature usually in service to a powerful creature with dominion over flying creatures. The affinity between owls and elves means that most wereowls are elves, rather than the humans typical among other lycanthropes. The wereowl possesses the keen eyesight that is common to owls, as well as the birds' preternatural ability to fly silently. Its appetite tends toward its avian nature, and it feasts on rodents and other small mammals, usually raw and directly after a successful hunt. Its attitudes toward rodents extends to {@creature wererat|mm|wererats} and rodent-like creatures, such as {@filter ratfolk|bestiary|tag=ratfolk}, and it often prefers to attack such creatures to the exclusion of other foes.

monster.name: Wereshark

walk.condition: in humanoid form (swim 50 ft. in shark and hybrid forms)

senses: blindsight 30 ft. (shark and hybrid form only)

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The wereshark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hp.

trait.name: Hold Breath (Hybrid Form Only)
entries: While out of water, the wereshark can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The wereshark can use its action to polymorph into a Large shark-humanoid hybrid or into a Large hunter shark, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size and AC, are the same in each form, with the exceptions that only its shark and hybrid forms retain its swimming speed, and its shark form doesn't retain its walking speed. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. The wereshark reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Water Breathing (Shark or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: The wereshark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: In humanoid or hybrid form, the wereshark makes three trident attacks.

action.name: Bite (Shark or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wereshark {@footnote lycanthropy|A {@spell remove curse} spell can rid an afflicted lycanthrope of the curse. {@note For further information, refer to the {@i Info} tab of the {@creature werewolf} bestiary entry.}}.

action.name: Trident (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
The twisted form of a humanoid shark hunches over, its grin showing rows of jagged teeth. Fresh blood drips from its mouth as it clutches a trident in powerful hands.

In humanoid form, weresharks tend to be powerfully-muscled and broad, with little body hair. They are solitary hunters who sometimes stalk and eat each other. If a wereshark spreads its curse, it's likely because the lycanthrope made a mistake and let potential prey get away.

entries.name: Voracious Appetites
entries: Weresharks are savage predators who, driven by voracious appetites, devour anything they come across. Aggressive in all forms, weresharks prefer to spend their time beneath the waves, hunting fish, seals, and other prey. They have no qualms about attacking humanoids or boats, particularly fishing vessels, which contain even more food for the lycanthrope to consume.

entries.name: Obsessed Predators
entries: Weresharks become obsessed with prey that gets away from them. A wereshark can stalk an individual through the seas and over land for months, leaving a path of destruction behind it, just to get a taste of what it missed.

trait.name: Distracting Swoop
entries: If the lymarien moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be distracted until the end of its next turn. A distracted creature has disadvantage on its next attack roll or ability check.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts
entries: The lymarien can communicate with beasts as if they shared a language.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})砍击伤害。
A tiny bird swoops through the air and alights on a nearby branch. It has the body of a tiny hawk, the colorful wings of a butterfly, and the head of an elf with large, luminous eyes.

entries.name: Miniscule Fey
entries: Dwelling in pastoral woods and rich farmland, the lymarien is one of the smallest fey in existence. Barely larger than a wasp, a lymarien is frequently mistaken for a butterfly and often ignored by larger creatures. They are sometimes preyed upon by birds like {@creature owl|mm|owls} and {@creature crow|wdmm|crows}, or attacked by evil fey like {@creature morko|ccodex|morkos} ({@loader Creature Codex|collection/Kobold Press; Creature Codex.json}).

entries.name: Guardians of the Young
entries: Lymariens have a fondness for fey and animal young, sometimes putting their lives at risk against superior opponents to save such creatures. When faced with a particularly powerful threat, lymariens form into massive, short-lived {@creature lymarien swarm|tob2|swarms}, gaining potent magical abilities in the process.

entries.name: Lymarien Familiars
entries: Some lymarien might choose to serve a good-aligned spellcaster as a familiar. Such lymarien have the following trait.

entries.name: Familiar
entries: The lymarien can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a magic, telepathic bond with that willing companion. While the two are bonded, the companion can sense what the lymarien senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the lymarien is within 10 feet of its companion, the companion shares the lymarien's Speak with Beasts trait. At any time and for any reason, the lymarien can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

variant.name: Lymarien Familiars
entries: Some lymarien might choose to serve a good-aligned spellcaster as a familiar. Such lymarien have the following trait.

entries.name: Familiar
entries: The lymarien can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a magic, telepathic bond with that willing companion. While the two are bonded, the companion can sense what the lymarien senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the lymarien is within 10 feet of its companion, the companion shares the lymarien's Speak with Beasts trait. At any time and for any reason, the lymarien can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

trait.name: Distracting Beauty
entries: A creature that starts its turn in the lymarien swarm's space must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be distracted by the swarm's luminous eyes and fluttering wings until the end of its next turn. A distracted creature has disadvantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on attack rolls against the lymarien swarm.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts
entries: The lymarien swarm can communicate with beasts as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny {@creature lymarien|ToB2}. The swarm can't regain hp or gain temporary hp.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lymarien swarm's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 3d6}) slashing damage if the swarm has half its hp or fewer.

action.name: Flight of the Fey {@recharge 4}
entries: The lymarien swarm lifts a Large or smaller creature in its space. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be lifted directly upward to a height up to the swarm's flying speed. When the swarm moves, the lifted creature moves with it. At the end of the swarm's turn, the swarm drops the creature, which takes falling damage as normal.
A tiny bird swoops through the air and alights on a nearby branch. It has the body of a tiny hawk, the colorful wings of a butterfly, and the head of an elf with large, luminous eyes.

entries.name: Miniscule Fey
entries: Dwelling in pastoral woods and rich farmland, the {@creature lymarien|ToB2} is one of the smallest fey in existence. Barely larger than a wasp, a lymarien is frequently mistaken for a butterfly and often ignored by larger creatures. They are sometimes preyed upon by birds like owls and crows, or attacked by evil fey like morkos.

entries.name: Guardians of the Young
entries: Lymariens have a fondness for fey and animal young, sometimes putting their lives at risk against superior opponents to save such creatures. When faced with a particularly powerful threat, lymariens form into massive, short-lived swarms, gaining potent magical abilities in the process.

monster.name: Mad Piper
languages: understands Common and Void Speech, but can't speak

trait.name: Inspire
entries: As a bonus action, the mad piper can play a tune that inspires a friendly creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the mad piper, it has advantage on its next ability check, attack roll, or saving throw.

action.name: Screaming Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) thunder damage.

action.name: Terrible Dirge
entries: The mad piper plays a haunting dirge. Each creature of the mad piper's choice that is within 30 feet of the piper and can hear the dirge must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the mad piper's Terrible Dirge for the next 24 hours.
A grey mound of flesh scuttles forward on mismatched limbs, its five heads trilling along on bone flutes. All the while, a harrowing tune plays from the column of pipes rising from its core.

Mad pipers are the heralds of the Great Old Ones, a sign that a cult is getting close to achieving their goals. Cultists receive visions from their masters, filling their dreams with the esoteric rituals needed to create a mad piper. In short order, the cult gathers the components and creates these creatures, typically one for each cell of the cult. When the time comes for the cult to do battle, the mad pipers follow, inspiring the faithful with the alien songs of the Great Old Ones.

entries.name: The Ritual
entries: During the ritual, five humanoids, one of which must be a musician of some kind, are tied to a set of bagpipes made from an ogre's bones and stomach. The ritual liquefies the humanoids, who fall into each other as all but their limbs and heads dissolve into a mass of grey flesh. Their minds, souls, and bodies forcefully merged, they start to play.

entries.name: Pets and Mascots
entries: Mad pipers aren't naturally evil. Most are made from {@creature commoner|mm|commoners}, resulting in relatively docile and loyal creatures that imprint quickly onto cult members, who in turn often come to treat these abominations as pets. More violent and powerful mad pipers can be made from powerful, evil humanoids, though they are harder to control and often hostile to their creators.

entries.name: True Pipers
entries: Scholars speculate that the mad pipers are modelled after the heralds of the Crawling Chaos, and that it was he who gifted the first ritual to mortals on behalf of all Great Old Ones.

entries.name: Construct Nature
entries: The mad piper doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

trait.name: Lava Bound
entries: The magma octopus can exist outside of lava for up to 1 hour each day. If it remains outside of lava for 1 minute or longer, its skin begins to dry and harden like rapidly-cooled magma. While its skin is hardened, it has a walking speed of 20 feet, an Armor Class of 18, and vulnerability to cold damage. If it remains outside of lava for 1 hour or longer, it becomes {@condition petrified}, transforming into basalt. Its body returns to normal if it is submerged in lava for 1 round.

trait.name: Lava Swimmer
entries: While in lava, the magma octopus has a swimming speed of 60 feet and can move through the lava as if it were water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The magma octopus makes four attacks with its tentacles.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and it takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. The magma octopus can grapple up to two targets at a time.

action.name: Magma Blast {@recharge 6}
entries: The magma octopus sprays magma in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If a creature fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it catches fire. Until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.
Eight tentacles reach out from the scorched body of this unusual octopus-like creature. Glowing yellow, orange, and red patches smolder on its skin, like embers flaring to life.

entries.name: Elemental Bodies
entries: Magma octopuses are creatures that physically resemble the marine animals for which they are named, but they make their homes in lava, swimming through it as easily as aquatic {@creature octopus|mm|octopuses} swim through water. Born in the fiery seas of the Plane of Fire long ago, many magma octopuses wandered to the Material Plane through various portals and thinned barriers between the planes. They exist throughout the world, particularly in underground caverns with open lava flows, within the craters of some volcanoes, and swimming through underground networks of magma.

entries.name: Intelligent
entries: Magma octopuses live simple lives with a quiet intelligence that slightly surpasses that of aquatic octopuses. They have no language and cannot communicate verbally. They are known to recognize individuals from other species and remember individuals that might have caused them pain or helped them out of a bad situation. Magma octopuses only fight others if they are attacked first, but they can become extremely territorial if intruders tread too close to home. They have a fondness for fire-based magic and sometimes can be recruited to serve as guardians for wizards, {@creature efreeti}, and other powerful, fiery creatures.

entries.name: Elemental Nature
entries: A magma octopus doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The malleable can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Controlled Mutability
entries: Any spell or effect that would alter the malleable's form only alters it until the end of the malleable's next turn. Afterwards, the malleable returns to its amorphous form. In addition, the malleable can use its action to change itself into any shape, but it always looks like an inside-out fleshy creature no matter the shape it takes. If it changes into the shape of a creature, it doesn't gain any statistics or special abilities of that creature; it only takes on the creature's basic shape and general appearance.

trait.name: Psychic Absorption
entries: Whenever the malleable is subjected to psychic damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hp equal to the psychic damage dealt.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The malleable can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Flesh Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}).

action.name: Psychic Drain
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by the malleable must make a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw, taking 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The target's hp maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies and becomes a minor malleable if this effect reduces its hp maximum to 0.

action.name: Join Malleables
entries: As long as the malleable is within 10 feet of at least three other minor malleables, each minor malleable in range can use this action option at the same time to join together and create a larger malleable. The new malleable's hp total is equal to the combined hp total of all the minor malleables. and it is affected by any conditions, spells, and other magical effects that affected any of the minor malleables. The new malleable acts on the same initiative count as the malleables that formed it and occupies any unoccupied space that previously contained at least one of the malleables that formed it.

items: Four minor malleables can join to create one {@creature moderate malleable|ToB2}.
Eight minor malleables can join to create one {@creature major malleable|ToB2}.
Sixteen minor malleables can join to create one {@creature massive malleable|ToB2}.

entries: A pile of red, gooey flesh slurps along the ground. The meat climbs upon itself, squishing as it creates a formidable, hungry wall.
Malleables are malevolent, formless piles of flesh that absorb psychic energy and grow smarter and stronger when combined together.

entries.name: Consumers of Psychic Power
entries: Creatures that consume psychic energy can become so infused with it that their bodies implode. The power lingers in the grotesque mass of flesh, warping the creature's mind even more than its body and creating a hunter that hungers to consume and grow. Malleables do not remember their personal lives before implosion, but they do retain facts and lore. They think themselves superior to all other creatures, which are simply prey. Their goals are simple: drain every creature they can of psychic energy and rule the world as a massive, roiling meat puddle. Malleables have infinite patience and can wait centuries until they feel the time is right to go on a psychic energy binge.

entries.name: Many Shapes
entries: Malleables have no set form, but they can stretch and alter their forms easily, moving on appendages or flowing like an ooze. They might form a face (or many faces at once) if they wish to convey an emotion to another creature, or take the shape of a truly terrifying beast (like a {@creature giant spider}) if they wish to create panic. No matter the shape they take, malleables always appear to be a fleshy creature turned inside out.

entries.name: Our Powers Combined
entries: Malleables can join together, creating a larger, more powerful creature that shares the intellect of all the combined intelligences. These bigger malleables can separate into smaller aberrations when it suits them.

entries.name: Ancient Knowledge Hoarders
entries: It is said that malleables have perfect memories and the oldest of these creatures remember ancient lore other creatures have long forgotten. Many sages have tried and failed to capture malleables to prod their minds for secrets, but the creatures almost always find a way to escape. Adventurers are often given the dangerous tasks of capturing, guarding, or questioning a malleable.

trait.name: Absorb Malleable
entries: As a bonus action, the moderate malleable absorbs one {@creature minor malleable|ToB2} within 5 feet of it into its body, regaining a number of hp equal to the {@creature minor malleable|ToB2|minor malleable's} remaining hp. The moderate malleable is affected by any conditions, spells, and other magical effects that were affecting the absorbed malleable.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The malleable can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Controlled Mutability
entries: Any spell or effect that would alter the malleable's form only alters it until the end of the malleable's next turn. Afterwards, the malleable returns to its amorphous form. In addition, the malleable can use its action to change itself into any shape, but it always looks like an inside-out fleshy creature no matter the shape it takes. If it changes into the shape of a creature, it doesn't gain any statistics or special abilities of that creature; it only takes on the creature's basic shape and general appearance.

trait.name: Psychic Absorption
entries: Whenever the malleable is subjected to psychic damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hp equal to the psychic damage dealt.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The malleable can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The malleable makes two flesh tendril attacks.

action.name: Flesh Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}).

action.name: Psychic Drain
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by the malleable must make a {@dc 14} Intelligence saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The target's hp maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies and becomes a {@creature minor malleable|ToB2} if this effect reduces its hp maximum to 0.

action.name: Join Malleables
entries: As long as the malleable is within 10 feet of at least one other moderate malleable, each moderate malleable in range can use this action option at the same time to join together to create a larger malleable. The new malleable's hp total is equal to the combined hp total of all the moderate malleables, and it is affected by any conditions, spells, and other magical effects currently affecting any of the moderate malleables. The new malleable acts on the same initiative count as the malleables that formed it and occupies any unoccupied space that previously contained at least one of the malleables that formed it.

items: Two moderate malleables can join to create one {@creature major malleable|ToB2}.
Four moderate malleables can join to create one {@creature massive malleable|ToB2}.

action.name: Separate Malleables
entries: The moderate malleable can split into four {@creature minor malleable|ToB2|minor malleables}. The new malleables' hp totals are equal to the moderate malleable's hp total divided by 4 (rounded down) and are affected by any conditions, spells, and other magical effects that affected the moderate malleable. The new malleables act on the same initiative count as the moderate malleable and occupy any unoccupied space that previously contained the moderate malleable.

reaction.name: Sudden Separation
entries: When the moderate malleable takes 10 damage or more from a single attack, it can choose to immediately use Separate Malleables. If it does so, the damage is divided evenly among the separate malleables it becomes.

action.name: Multiattack
